item.calamity.thigh_highs.tooltip: So comfy you'll §onever§r want to take them off...
itemGroup.calamity.base: Create: Calamity. Run while you can
Create: Calamity. Run while you can
item.calamity.plushie.506.tooltip: The fucking water turned me gay
item.calamity.plushie.raeeeee.tooltip: I will be the master of procrastination... someday
item.calamity.plushie.shirojr.tooltip1: Cities that are attacked by nuclear missiles
item.calamity.plushie.shirojr.tooltip2: burn at such an intensity that they create their own
item.calamity.plushie.shirojr.tooltip3: wind system, a firestorm: hot air above the burning
item.calamity.plushie.shirojr.tooltip4: city ascends and is replaced by air that rushes
item.calamity.plushie.shirojr.tooltip5: in from all directions. The storm-force winds fan
item.calamity.plushie.shirojr.tooltip6: the flames and create immense heat.
death.attack.crunching.player: %1$s was crunched to death while fighting %1$s
advancement.createcalamity.bonked.title: Bonk! it goes indeed
advancement.createcalamity.bonked.desc: Get crushed by a mechanical press.
advancement.createcalamity.crunched.desc: Have 2 maximum speed opposite-running cogwheels crunch you to death.
advancement.createcalamity.comfy_100.des: Avoid being detected by a sculk sensor by wearing thigh highs :3
_: Thank you for translating Create: Calamity!
